articles.content: 18:53 Local Time, 08:23 GMT, 13:53 IST: The Heat win and stay alive in contention for the playoffs. They have done the double over the Strikers this season. Excellent effort from Heat who defended 15… [+575 chars]

articles.author: Archie Griggs
articles.title: Bruno Fernandes thought about quitting Man Utd and had frank meeting with John Murtough - Express
articles.description: Bruno Fernandes signed a long-term deal at Old Trafford back in April but initially had doubts about doing so.
